title: THE UNITED STATES OF AMERKKK.
review: Pros: Black beauty & pride on screen.  The film was well made.  The film had a retro vibe. Cons: not enough attention on the black power group members. Too much attention on the kkk group members.  The film felt pointless & too comical for such a serious topic.
